description: Our vegan version of the Shamrock Shake is made with whole foods, such as bananas, fresh mint, spinach, and hemp milk. It's thick and creamy, delicious, and actually good for you!
name: Whole Foods Plant-Based Healthier Shamrock Shake
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup hemp milk (or any plant-based milk)
water (if you want to thin it out)

recipeInstructions.text: Add all of the ingredients to a blander and blend until it's smooth and creamy, approximately 90 seconds. If you like a thinner consistency, add water, 1 tbsp (15 ml) at a time until you get it to your liking.
